content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet what a fun design this clementine scrubby is folks are always asking me for new scrubby designs and i love to oblige 1 easy to read crochet pattern 2 fast to crochet 3 uses red heart scrubby sparkle yarn 4 coordinating orange and clementine crochet patterns for you to make a collection 5 video support available at this link https //www youtube com/watch v=i_frikc6oq4&t=231s 1 you can make several of these adorable scrubbies in an evening they are great craft show sellers plus your family will jump to help you in the kitchen when you hand them one of these hard working pot scrubbers copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright©krissysoverthemountaincrochet 2022 do not distribute alter or share this pattern in any shape or form you have my permission to sell the product you make using my pattern no mass production is allowed 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=i_frikc6oq4&t=231s
